availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elzira Tyree Henderson in Carter County, Kentucky, on June 15, 1850. Father of Robert Henderson, John Henderson, Emily Henderson, Christley Henderson, Henry Henderson, James Henderson, and Eliza Henderson. Farmer in Carter County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 252A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, pp. 175-6.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 3, p. 122A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Carter County Marriages, Film 000344061.
"Harve Henderson (1821-1888)," Find A Grave, Memorial 26021861, accessed August 9, 2023, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/26021861.
KYR-0001-020-0715.
